description: The instance create call used instance_get to gather information about the instance once it is created. This command used _build_instance_get in the db api. _build_instance_get tries to join the IPs into the response, but they are stored in Melange and not in that database. We need to gate this on the melange flag; or always look in the network cache, if it has this information.
title: instance create fails to show IPs when using melange

comments.content: The instance create call used instance_get to gather information about the instance once it is created. This command used _build_instance_get in the db api. _build_instance_get tries to join the IPs into the response, but they are stored in Melange and not in that database. We need to gate this on the melange flag; or always look in the network cache, if it has this information.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~aaron-lee

comments.content: This is not required according to the API spec, and isn't really a bug.  Since the IP creation happens asynchronously we can't return it in the synchronous.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~westmaas
